20101207114844.333|20101207114847.667|CCO|ARE ASKING JUST ONE QUESTION, 
20101207114847.667|20101207114851.000|CCO|ARE WE GOING TO ALLOW THEIR

20101207114857.250|20101207114858.500|CCO|RECOVERY AND GET PEOPLE BACK TO 
20101207114858.500|20101207114859.750|CCO|WORK.

20101207114911.000|20101207114912.667|CCO|FOR THE MIDDLE CLASS.

20101207114914.333|20101207114916.000|CCO|TAKEN THE BIGGEST HIT, NOT ONLY

20101207115347.000|20101207115349.000|CCO|THAT HELPS FAMILIES CLIMB OUT OF
20101207115349.000|20101207115351.000|CCO|PROFIT.
20101207115351.000|20101207115353.500|CCO|THE CHILD TAX CREDIT THAT MAKES 
20101207115353.500|20101207115356.000|CCO|SURE PEOPLE DON'T SEE THEIR 
20101207115356.000|20101207115358.500|CCO|TAXES JUMP FOR EVERY CHILD AND 
20101207115358.500|20101207115401.000|CCO|THE AMERICAN ECONOMY TAX CREDITS
20101207115401.000|20101207115403.000|CCO|WHICH ENSURES COLLEGE DOESN'T 
20101207115403.000|20101207115405.000|CCO|IMMEDIATELY SHOOT UP.
20101207115405.000|20101207115407.000|CCO|THESE ARE THE TAX CUTS FOR SOME 
20101207115407.000|20101207115409.000|CCO|OF THE FOLKS HIT HARDEST BY THE 
20101207115409.000|20101207115411.000|CCO|RECESSION.
20101207115411.000|20101207115412.667|CCO|AND IT WOULD BE UNACCEPTABLE IF 
20101207115412.667|20101207115414.333|CCO|THEIR TAXES WENT UP WHILE 
20101207115414.333|20101207115416.000|CCO|EVERYBODY ELSE'S STAYED THE 
20101207115416.000|20101207115417.667|CCO|SAME.
20101207115417.667|20101207115419.333|CCO|UNDER THE AGREEMENT UNEMPLOYMENT
20101207115419.333|20101207115421.000|CCO|INSURANCE WILL BE EXTENDED 
20101207115421.000|20101207115422.667|CCO|ANOTHER 13 MONTHS, WHICH WILL BE

20101207115429.333|20101207115431.000|CCO|THE MIDDLE OF THE HOLIDAY 
20101207115431.000|20101207115432.667|CCO|SEASON.
20101207115432.667|20101207115434.333|CCO|THIS AGREEMENT WOULD ALSO MEAN A
20101207115434.333|20101207115436.000|CCO|2% EMPLOYEE PAYROLL TAX CUT FOR 
20101207115436.000|20101207115437.667|CCO|WORKERS NEXT YEAR.
20101207115437.667|20101207115439.333|CCO|A TAX CUT THAT ECONOMISTS AGREE 
20101207115439.333|20101207115441.000|CCO|IS ONE OF THE MOST POWERFUL 
20101207115441.000|20101207115444.333|CCO|THINGS WE CAN DO TO CREATE JOBS

20101207115451.000|20101207115453.000|CCO|FOR BUSINESSES TO CREATE JOBS BY

20101207115455.000|20101207115457.000|CCO|INVESTMENTS COMPLETELY NEXT 
20101207115457.000|20101207115459.000|CCO|YEAR.
20101207115459.000|20101207115501.000|CCO|IT WAS IDENTIFIED IN SEPTEMBER 
20101207115501.000|20101207115503.500|CCO|AS A WAY TO HELP BUSINESSES 
20101207115503.500|20101207115506.000|CCO|CREATE JOBS.
20101207115506.000|20101207115508.500|CCO|IN EXCHANGE, THE REPUBLICANS 
20101207115508.500|20101207115511.000|CCO|HAVE ASKED FOR MORE GENEROUS 
20101207115511.000|20101207115512.667|CCO|TREATMENT OF THE ESTATE TAX THAN
20101207115512.667|20101207115514.333|CCO|I THINK IS WISE OR WARRANTED.
20101207115514.333|20101207115516.000|CCO|BUT WE HAVE INSISTED THAT THAT 
20101207115516.000|20101207115517.667|CCO|WILL BE TEMPORARY.
20101207115517.667|20101207115519.333|CCO|I HAVE NO DOUBT THAT EVERYONE 
20101207115519.333|20101207115521.000|CCO|WILL FIND SOMETHING IN THIS 
20101207115521.000|20101207115522.667|CCO|COMPROMISE THAT THEY DON'T LIKE.
20101207115522.667|20101207115524.333|CCO|IN FACT, THERE ARE THINGS IN 
20101207115524.333|20101207115526.000|CCO|HERE THAT I DON'T LIKE, NAMELY 
20101207115526.000|20101207115527.667|CCO|THE EXTENSION OF THE TAX CUTS 
20101207115527.667|20101207115529.333|CCO|FOR THE WEALTHIEST AMERICANS AND
20101207115529.333|20101207115531.000|CCO|WEALTHIEST ESTATES.
20101207115531.000|20101207115533.000|CCO|BUT THESE TAX CUTS WILL EXPIRE 
20101207115533.000|20101207115535.000|CCO|IN TWO YEARS AND I'M CONFIDENT 
20101207115535.000|20101207115537.000|CCO|THAT AS WE MAKE TOUGH CHOICES 
20101207115537.000|20101207115539.000|CCO|ABOUT BRINGING OUR DEFICIT DOWN,
20101207115539.000|20101207115541.000|CCO|AS I ENGAGE IN A CONVERSATION 
20101207115541.000|20101207115542.667|CCO|WITH THE AMERICAN PEOPLE ABOUT 
20101207115542.667|20101207115544.333|CCO|THE HARD CHOICES WE ARE GOING TO
20101207115544.333|20101207115546.000|CCO|HAVE TO MAKE TO SECURE OUR
